items.name: Wanderer's Old Shoes
items.description: Increase move speed by 10%

items.name: Magician's Eye
items.description: Increase camera view by 10%

items.name: Fool’s Eye
items.description: Reduce camera view by 20%

items.name: Slippery Gel
items.description: Dash speed increases while dashing in same direction

items.name: Soul Absorber
items.description: Restore energy when killing an enemy

items.name: Blood Nitropump
items.description: Use HP to dash when energy is empty

items.name: Cain’s Fate
items.description: Dashing heals you; lose HP if idle or hitting walls

items.name: Limit Amplifier
items.description: Deal more damage to off-screen enemies

items.name: Magma Trail
items.description: Leave fire trail while moving

items.name: Thorn Pain
items.description: Periodically emit damaging spikes around you

items.name: Bloodied Gladiator Helm
items.description: Dash deals damage and reduces damage taken

items.name: One’s Own Eye
items.description: Lower view, chance to ignore damage

items.name: Gladiator's Head
items.description: Can break walls at high speed; Corpse Part+1

items.name: Rightless Left Foot
items.description: Reversed control if missing right foot; Corpse Part+1

items.name: Leftless Right Foot
items.description: Reversed control if missing left foot; Corpse Part+1

items.name: Holey Coin Purse
items.description: Drop coins while dashing; find more coins

items.name: Respiro
items.description: Slowly regenerate energy over time

items.name: Syrup
items.description: Instantly refill energy when empty; recharges over time

items.name: Mysterious Amulet
items.description: Survive fatal damage once; become briefly invincible

items.name: Bull Warrior Mask
items.description: Short dashes knock enemies back; +1 Corpse Part
